overview: Frivoliti.com is a free online tech news aggregator - grating and serving you the latest tech scoop before it hits the news desks. Frivoliti.com delves into the world of technology, packages and aggregates tech news and reviews, analysis of technology trends, and expert advice on topics ranging from the most fundamental aspects of technology to the many ways technology is helping us enjoy our world. We work for the reader who not only needs to keep up with technology in technology, but is passionate about it.
